mapper.select: select cd.CODE_ID ,c.CODE_NAME ,cd.CODE_DETAIL_ID ,cd.CODE_DETAIL_NAME FROM COMMON c, COMMON_DETAIL cd <<<<<<< HEAD WHERE cd.CODE_ID = c.CODE_ID and (cd.CODE_ID = 300 or cd.CODE_ID = 200) ORDER BY c.CODE_ID DESC, cd.CODE_DETAIL_ID DESC ======= WHERE cd.CODE_ID = c.CODE_ID and cd.CODE_ID = 300 >>>>>>> branch 'master' of https://github.com/jintaeki/final_ppp_survey.git
